# rasterdiv

## Installation

### Stable version from [CRAN](https://cran.microsoft.com/):

``` r
install.packages("rasterdiv")
```

### Development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/):

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("mattmar/rasterdiv")
```

## What is rasterdiv?

***rasterdiv*** is an R package that provides functions to apply
diversity indexes based on Information Theory on RasterLayer or
numerical matrices. Supported indexes include:

- Parametric Rao’s quadratic entropy (classical and multidimensional);
- Shannon’s diversity index;
- Pielou’s evenness index;
- Hill’s generalised entropy;
- Rényi’s generalised entropy;
- Berger-Parker index;
- Cumulative Residual Entropy (CRE)

## New Features

- Time Series Integration: The package recently integrated time series
  of remote sensing data to derive Rao’s index, for example considering
  plant phenology. See the vignette: [Multidimension Rao’s
  Index](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/articles/rasterdiv_03_Advanced_multidimension_Rao.html).
- Helical Graphs: Prepare and plot time series with “helical graphs”.
  See the vignette: [Visualising rasterdiv indexes with Helical
  Plots](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/articles/rasterdiv_05_Helical_Plots.html).

## Key Features

- Moving Window and Area-Based Calculations: Derive indexes using a
  “moving window” approach (all functions) or area-based Parametric
  Rao’s quadratic entropy via
  [*paRao()*](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/articles/rasterdiv_area_based_Rao.html)

## Learn More on **rasterdiv**

- [***rasterdiv**—An Information Theory tailored R package for measuring
  ecosystem heterogeneity from space: To the origin and
  back*](https://besjournals.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/2041-210X.13583);
- [*Measuring diversity from space: a global view of the free and open
  source rasterdiv R package under a coding
  perspective*](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s42974-021-00042-x);
- [*From zero to infinity: Minimum to maximum diversity of the planet by
  spatio-parametric Rao’s quadratic
  entropy*](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/geb.13270)
- [*Helical graphs to visualize the NDVI temporal variation of forest
  vegetation in an open source
  space*](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S157495412200406X)
- [*Phenological Diversity Trends with Remote Sensing
  Datacubes*](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Matteo-Marcantonio/publication/381288639_Phenological_Diversity_Trends_with_Remote_Sensing_Datacubes/links/6666a0fbb769e76919269fa1/Phenological-Diversity-Trends-with-Remote-Sensing-Datacubes.pdf)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`BergerParker()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/BergerParker.md)
  : Berger-Parker's diversity index
- [`BergerParkerP()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/BergerParkerP.md)
  : Calculate Berger-Parker Index on a Matrix
- [`BergerParkerS()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/BergerParkerS.md)
  : Sequential Berger-Parker's diversity index
- [`CRE()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/CRE.md) :
  Cumulative Residual Entropy (CRE) Function
- [`Hill()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/Hill.md) :
  Hill's index of diversity - Hill numbers (D)
- [`Pielou()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/Pielou.md)
  : Pielou's Evenness Index
- [`PielouP()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/PielouP.md)
  : Parallelised Pielou's diversity index
- [`PielouS()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/PielouS.md)
  : Sequential Pielou's diversity index
- [`Rao()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/Rao.md) :
  Rao's index
- [`RaoAUC()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/RaoAUC.md)
  : Accumulation function for parametric Rao's index of quadratic
  entropy (Q)
- [`Renyi()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/Renyi.md) :
  Renyi Diversity Index Calculation
- [`RenyiP()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/RenyiP.md)
  : Parallel Computation of Renyi's Diversity Index
- [`RenyiS()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/RenyiS.md)
  : Sequential Renyi's diversity index
- [`Shannon()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/Shannon.md)
  : Shannon's Evenness Index
- [`ShannonP()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/ShannonP.md)
  : Calculate Shannon-Wiener Index on a Matrix
- [`ShannonS()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/ShannonS.md)
  : Calculate Shannon-Wiener Index on a Matrix
- [`copNDVI`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/copNDVI.md)
  : Copernicus Long Term (1999-2017) NDVI Overview (5km)
- [`.CRE_()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/dot-CRE_.md)
  : Cumulative Residual Entropy
- [`.CumRes()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/dot-CumRes.md)
  : Calculate Cumulative Residual Probability
- [`.Deltas()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/dot-Deltas.md)
  : Calculate Differences Among Values
- [`.Prob()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/dot-Prob.md)
  : Calculate Point Probability
- [`.Reorder()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/dot-Reorder.md)
  : Additional supporting functions like \`.Reorder\`, \`.Cumsum\`,
  \`.Rev\`
- [`heliPlot()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/heliPlot.md)
  : Create a Helical Plot for Time Series Data
- [`heliPrep()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/heliPrep.md)
  : Prepare Data for Helical Plotting
- [`load_copNDVI()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/load_copNDVI.md)
  : Load Copernicus NDVI data
- [`mpaRaoAreaS()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/mpaRaoAreaS.md)
  : Area-Based Sequential Parametric Rao's index of quadratic entropy
  (Q)
- [`mpaRaoS()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/mpaRaoS.md)
  : Multidimensional sequential Parametric Rao's index of quadratic
  entropy (Q)
- [`ndviForestTS`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/ndviForestTS.md)
  : Simulated NDVI dataset
- [`openCluster()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/openCluster.md)
  : Open a Parallel Cluster
- [`paRao()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/paRao.md) :
  Parametric Rao's index of quadratic entropy (Q)
- [`paRaoP()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/paRaoP.md)
  : Parallelized Parametric Rao's index of quadratic entropy (Q)
- [`paRaoS()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/paRaoS.md)
  : Sequential Parametric Rao's index of quadratic entropy (Q)
- [`process_raster_result()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/process_raster_result.md)
  : Process Raster Results
- [`validateInputs()`](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/reference/validateInputs.md)
  : Validate Input Parameters for Diversity Index Calculation

### All vignettes

- [Indices of diversity from
  NDVI.](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/articles/rasterdiv_01_Basics.md):
- [Area-based Rao's
  index.](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/articles/rasterdiv_02_Area_based_Rao.md):
- [Multidimension Rao's
  Index.](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/articles/rasterdiv_03_Advanced_multidimension_Rao.md):
- [Derive the Accumulation Rao's
  Index](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/articles/rasterdiv_04_Accumulation_Rao.md):
- [Visualising rasterdiv indexes with Helical
  Plots](https://mattmar.github.io/rasterdiv/articles/rasterdiv_05_Helical_Plots.md):
